name: piped
description: Piped is a privacy-friendly YouTube frontend that can be self-hosted. It offers ad-free, tracking-free access with clean UI, subscriptions, and streaming without Google's infrastructure.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Watch YouTube videos without tracking, ads, or Google account requirements

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Subscribe to channels and receive updates without a YouTube account

features.title: Playlist Support
features.description: Create and manage playlists independently from YouTube's infrastructure

features.title: Video Quality Selection
features.description: Choose preferred video quality and format for streaming or downloading

features.title: Sponsorblock Integration
features.description: Automatically skip sponsored segments, intros, and outros in videos

features.title: Comments Viewing
features.description: Read video comments without exposing your identity or activity to Google

features.title: Feed Customization
features.description: View subscriptions in a chronological feed without algorithmic recommendations

features.title: Instance Federation
features.description: Connect to multiple Piped instances for redundancy and load distribution
